CustomField.description: Map additional fields to be copied between the hard/soft credit and review transaction. Format is {"Hard and Soft Credit Field API Name":"Review Transaction Field API Name"}.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Map additional fields to be copied between the hard/soft credit and review transaction. Format is {"Hard and Soft Credit Field API Name":"Review Transaction Field API Name"}.
CustomField.label: Hard and Soft Credit Field Map
